channel.title: [SRL4-15][RS2] IPowerMiner | By IP-Drowner
channel.description:
[CENTER][COLOR=Red][SIZE=15pt][B]IPowerMiner[/B][/SIZE][/COLOR][COLOR=Blue][SIZE=14pt] The next generation of PowerMining[/SIZE][/COLOR][/CENTER]
[size=15pt][b]WARNING:[/b] I am [u]NOT[/u] updating this script anymore, so if you post an error it'll not be answered as it is already answered if you look through other posts. If an error still persists, follow these:[/size] [ul][*]Download and Install SCAR Divi 3.12c. [*]Get the Revision 15 of SRL. [*]Get the latest SCAR Version. [*]Download and Install SCAR Divi 3.15.[/ul]
[size=15pt]If those don't work, then don't use this script! Just in case, please lock this thread to prevent further distribution of this script.[/size]
This script was created in a week and i reckon i have done a pretty good job. This script uses SRL stats, so please use them. All you have to do is just sign up at [url=http://stats.srl-forums.com]stats.srl-forums.com[/url] then enter your ID and Password into 51 and 52, this is very simple.
Please also post progress reports and post bugs. So if you post Progress Reports and post Bugs then i can update this script and nothing will worry you too much.
This script has not been tested and it compiles fine. But if you could test it for me please, post progress reports, bugs and suggestions then i can gladly update the script to your needs as-well as others.
[b]Please note this script has not been tested, ore colours are from previous versions and may be wrong. Use with caution![/b]
[B][U][SIZE=14pt][COLOR=SeaGreen]Bugs known:[/COLOR][/SIZE][/U][/B] [ul][*] Not Auto Colour with all ores.[/ul]
[B][U][SIZE=14pt][COLOR=SeaGreen]What this script has:[/COLOR][/SIZE][/U][/B] [ul][*] Has Anti Randoms [*] Has Anti Ban [*] Good Anti Gas Finding [*] SRL Statistics (I think i have set it up right) [*] Multi Player + Extra Multi Player options to use [*] Is Auto Colour [*] Detect Pick Axe so you don't have to put what Pickaxe you're using. [*] Huge Progress Report. [*] A Few Procedures/Function's Created By Me. [*] Supports Custom Tolerance Levels. [*] Fail Safes[/ul]
[B][U][SIZE=14pt][COLOR=SeaGreen]Version Tracker:[/COLOR][/SIZE][/U][/B] [ul][*]1.0 - BETA Release. [*]1.1 - THETA Release. [*]3.0 - Major Improvements. [*]3.0.1 - Fixed few loading bugs.[/ul]
[B][U][SIZE=14pt][COLOR=SeaGreen]Requirements:[/COLOR][/SIZE][/U][/B] [ul][*] SRL Includes Package [*] SCAR 3.12c - 3.13 (Tested on 3.13)[/ul]
Ok, enjoy my script and post feedback :) Hope you get good mining levels out of it ;)
[b]Progress Reports (Highest-Lowest):[/b][code=geshi] /======================================================\ | IP-owerMiner Progress Report | | Created by IP-Drowner | |--------------------------------------------------------| | Current Players Report: | | Player Name: bba | Loads Completed: 10 | Ore's Mined: 289 | Original Mining Level: 72 | Current Mining Level: 72 |--------------------------------------------------------| | Total Progress Report | | Script Run Time: 23 Minutes | Total Completed Loads: 10 | Total Ores Mined: 289 | Player's Being Used: 1 | SRL Statistics ID: [i]None[/i] |--------------------------------------------------------| | IP-owerMiner Progress Report | | Created by IP-Drowner | \======================================================/[/code]
Enjoy!

item.title: [SRL4-15][RS2] IPowerMiner | By IP-Drowner
item.dc:creator: @IP-Drowner IP-Drowner
item.description:
@IP-Drowner wrote:

[quote=“Shmilly, post:6, topic:200970”]hey guys i got the same as the post before me
any advice?[/quote]
I have stopped updating this script as it uses a crap mining method (FindObject), so i quit updating it. but it should still work. Either get the latest SCAR or down-grade to SCAR Divi 3.12c

Read full topic

[CENTER][COLOR=Red][SIZE=15pt]IPowerMiner[/SIZE][/COLOR][COLOR=Blue][SIZE=14pt]
The next generation of PowerMining[/SIZE][/COLOR][/CENTER]

[size=15pt]WARNING: I am NOT updating this script anymore, so if you post an error it’ll not be answered as it is already answered if you look through other posts. If an error still persists, follow these:[/size]
[ul][]Download and Install SCAR Divi 3.12c.
[]Get the Revision 15 of SRL.
[]Get the latest SCAR Version.
[]Download and Install SCAR Divi 3.15.[/ul]

[size=15pt]If those don’t work, then don’t use this script! Just in case, please lock this thread to prevent further distribution of this script.[/size]

This script was created in a week and i reckon i have done a pretty good job. This script uses SRL stats, so please use them. All you have to do is just sign up at stats.srl-forums.com then enter your ID and Password into 51 and 52, this is very simple.

Please also post progress reports and post bugs. So if you post Progress Reports and post Bugs then i can update this script and nothing will worry you too much.

This script has not been tested and it compiles fine. But if you could test it for me please, post progress reports, bugs and suggestions then i can gladly update the script to your needs as-well as others.

Ok, enjoy my script and post feedback Hope you get good mining levels out of it
